sqlMap.select: select a.id,a.name,a.annualmatch,a.matchid,b.name matchname,a.unitname,a.authors,a.teachers,a.description, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.updatetime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') updatetime,a.state,a.memberid,IFNULL(a.checkuserid,0) checkuserid, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.checktime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') checktime from t_matchapply a,t_matchinfo b where a.matchid=b.id and a.isvalid=1 and a.memberid=#memberid# order by a.updatetime desc

select a.id,a.name,a.annualmatch,a.matchid,b.name matchname,a.unitname,a.authors,a.teachers,a.description, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.updatetime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') updatetime,a.state,a.memberid,IFNULL(a.checkuserid,0) checkuserid, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.checktime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') checktime, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(c.publishtime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') publishtime from t_matchapply a,t_matchinfo b,t_matchresult c where a.matchid=b.id and a.id=c.id and a.isvalid=1 and c.ispublish=1 and a.memberid=#memberid# order by a.updatetime desc

select count(a.id) from t_matchapply a,t_matchinfo b where a.matchid=b.id and a.isvalid=1 and a.state>0
a.name like CONCAT('%',#name#,'%')

select a.id,a.name,a.annualmatch,a.matchid,b.name matchname,a.unitname,a.authors,a.teachers,a.description, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.updatetime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') updatetime,a.state,a.memberid,IFNULL(a.checkuserid,0) checkuserid, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.checktime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') checktime,IFNULL(c.id,0) matchresultid,IFNULL(c.ispublish,0) ispublish from t_matchapply a LEFT JOIN t_matchresult c on a.id=c.id,t_matchinfo b where a.matchid=b.id and a.isvalid=1 and a.state>0
a.name like CONCAT('%',#name#,'%')
order by a.updatetime desc limit $firstRow$,$listRows$

select count(a.id) from t_matchapply a,t_matchinfo b where a.matchid=b.id and a.isvalid=1 and a.state=2
a.name like CONCAT('%',#name#,'%')

select a.id,a.name,a.annualmatch,a.matchid,b.name matchname,a.unitname,a.authors,a.teachers,a.description, a.state,a.memberid,IFNULL(a.checkuserid,0) checkuserid, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.checktime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') checktime,IFNULL(c.id,0) matchresultid,IFNULL(c.ispublish,0) ispublish, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(c.publishtime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') publishtime, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(c.updatetime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') updatetime from t_matchapply a LEFT JOIN t_matchresult c on a.id=c.id,t_matchinfo b where a.matchid=b.id and a.isvalid=1 and a.state=2
a.name like CONCAT('%',#name#,'%')
order by c.updatetime desc limit $firstRow$,$listRows$

select a.id,a.name,a.annualmatch,a.matchid,b.name matchname,a.unitname,a.authors,a.teachers,a.description, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.updatetime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') updatetime,a.state,a.memberid,IFNULL(a.checkuserid,0) checkuserid, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.checktime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') checktime,IFNULL(c.id,0) matchresultid, IFNULL(c.score,0) score,c.ranking,c.awards,IFNULL(c.ispublish,0) ispublish, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(c.publishtime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') publishtime from t_matchapply a LEFT JOIN t_matchresult c on a.id=c.id,t_matchinfo b where a.matchid=b.id and a.id=#id#
select id,name from t_matchinfo t where t.isvalid=1
sqlMap.update: update t_matchapply set state=#state#,checkuserid=#checkuserid# where id=#id#
